item.title: BL-80/NV-535 West Approaching NV-225
item.description: BL-80/NV-535 West (Idaho Street) approaching NV-225 North (Mountain City Highway and Silver St.). Use NV-225 north (Mountain City Highway) to Boise (Idaho). Continue west on BL-80/NV-535 to Elko West. Turn left for Silver St.

item.title: BL-80/NV-535 West Approaching NV-225/To I-80
item.description: BL-80/NV-535 (Idaho St.) approaching NV-225/ To I-80 (Mountain City Highway) in Elko. The sign shows NV-225 straight ahead, but it should have a right arrow.

item.title: NV-227 North at BL-80/NV-535 (Idaho St.)
item.description: NV-227 North (5th St.) at BL-80/NV-535 (Idaho St.) in Elko. Use BL-80/NV-535 West for NV-225; use BL-80 for I-80.

item.title: NV-225 North - Mountain Time
item.description: Entering Mountain Time Zone on NV-225 north, approaching the Idaho state line. The official time zone boundary is the Nevada-Idaho state line, but the towns of Owyhee and Mountain City, NV both observe Mountain Time.

item.title: NV-225 North - Brand Inspection Required
item.description: Brand Inspection Required on Livestock Leaving Nevada on NV-225 north.

item.title: NV-225 South - Trail Creek Road
item.description: NV-225 south at Trail Creek Road to Maggie Summit

item.title: NV-225 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NV-225 south. Distance to Elko, Carlin (via I-80), and Eureka (via I-80 and NV-278).

item.title: NV-225 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NV-225 north. Distance to Mountain Home (Idaho) and Boise (Idaho). This is the last distance marker northbound on NV-225 in Nevada.

item.title: NV-225 North Approaching NV-226
item.description: NV-225 North approaching NV-226 - Tuscarora Junction.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 301 Offramp
item.description: I-80 West Exit 301 offramp at NV-225. Turn left for NV-225 North to Boise (Idaho); left for NV-225 South to Elko.

item.title: NV-225 South at I-80 East
item.description: NV-225 South at I-80 East (Exit 301).

item.title: NV-225 South - Adobe Summit
item.description: Adobe Summit - Elevation 6548 Feet on NV-225 south.

item.title: End NV-226 South at NV-225
item.description: End NV-226 South at NV-225 - Tuscarora Junction.

item.title: End NV-226 at NV-225
item.description: End NV-226 east at NV-225 at Tuscarora Junction.

item.title: End NV-226 South at NV-225
item.description: End NV-226 South at NV-225. Turn left on NV-225 north for Mountain City; left on NV-225 south for Elko.

item.title: NV-226 East Approaching NV-225
item.description: NV-226 East approaching NV-225 at Tuscarora Junction.

item.title: NV-225 South - Owyhee Road
item.description: NV-225 south at Owyhee Road to Owyhee Airport. Continue on NV-225 for Mountain City and Elko.

item.title: NV-225 North - Mountain Time
item.description: Entering Mountain Time Zone on NV-225 north, approaching the Idaho state line. The official time zone boundary is the Nevada-Idaho state line, but the towns of Owyhee and Mountain City, NV both observe Mountain Time.

item.title: NV-225 North - Entering Duck Valley Reservation
item.description: Entering the Duck Valley Indian Reservation on NV-225 north. The Duck Valley Indian Reservation is located on the Idaho-Nevada border and is home to the Shoshone-Paiute Tribe.

item.title: NV-225 North - Mountain City
item.description: Entering Mountain City on NV-225 North. Elevation 5,609 Feet.

item.title: NV-225 North - Maggie Summit Road
item.description: NV-225 north at Maggie Summit Road.

item.title: NV-225 North - Gold Creek Road
item.description: NV-225 north at Gold Creek Road to Gold Creek and Jarbidge.

item.title: NV-225 North - North Fork Road
item.description: NV-225 north at North Fork Road junction. North Fork refers to the North Fork of the Humboldt River.

item.title: NV-225 North - Charleston/Jarbidge Jct.
item.description: NV-225 North at junction with road to Charleston and Jarbidge.

item.title: NV-225 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on NV-225 North to Mountain City, Owyhee, and Boise (Idaho).

item.title: NV-225 North at I-80 West
item.description: NV-225 north at I-80 West (Exit 301).

item.title: NV-225 North at I-80
item.description: NV-225 north at I-80. Turn right for I-80 east; continue over freeway for I-80 west.

item.title: NV-225 North at I-80 East
item.description: NV-225 north at I-80 east (Exit 301) to Salt Lake. Continue over freeway for I-80 west to Reno.

item.title: BL-80 West at NV-225 (To I-80)
item.description: BL-80 West at NV-225 North. Continue west on BL-80 (Idaho St.) for I-80.

item.title: BL-80 West at NV-225
item.description: BL-80 West (Idaho Street) at NV-225 North. Use NV-225 north to Boise. Continue west on BL-80 to Elko West. Turn left for Silver St.

item.title: BL-80 West To NV-225/I-80
item.description: BL-80 West (Idaho St.), to NV-225 and I-80.

item.title: End NV-227 at BL-80 (Idaho St.)
item.description: End NV-227 west at BL-80 (Idaho St.) in downtown Elko. Use Idaho St. for access to I-80. Use Idaho St. west for access to NV-225.

item.title: Welcome To Nevada - NV-225 South
item.description: Welcome to Nevada on NV-225 south. Elko County Nevada Postmile marker as well.

item.title: Welcome To Nevada - NV-225 South
item.description: Welcome to Nevada on NV-225 south. Elko County Nevada Postmile marker as well.

item.title: NV-225 North - Entering Owyhee
item.description: Entering Owyhee, Nevada on NV-225 north. Elevation 5400 feet. Owyhee is on the Duck Valley Indian Reservation.

item.title: NV-225 North At Gold Creek/Jarbidge Jct
item.description: NV-225 north at the Gold Creek/Jarbidge Junction. Jarbidge, NV is one of the most isolated towns in the lower 48.

item.title: End NV-226 at NV-225
item.description: End NV-226 east at NV-225. NV-225 goes north to Owyhee, and south to Elko.

item.title: End NV-226 at NV-225
item.description: End NV-226 east at NV-225 at Tuscarora Junction.

item.title: NV-225 North Approaching NV-226
item.description: NV-225 north to Mountain City approaching NV-226 west to Tuscarora.

item.title: NV-225 North Approaching Tuscarora Jct.
item.description: NV-225 north approaching NV-226 at Tuscarora Junction. Nevada often gives names to its rural highway junctions.

item.title: NV-225 North at I-80 West Exit 301
item.description: NV-225 north at I-80 West/Exit 301 onramp.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 301 Offramp at NV-225
item.description: I-80 east Exit 301 offramp at NV-225 north to Boise (ID) and south to Elko.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 301
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 301 - NV-225/Elko/Downtown. NV-225 connects Elko with Mountain Home, Idaho via ID-51.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 301
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 301 - NV-225/Elko/Downtown.

item.title: BL-80 West at NV-225
item.description: BL-80 West (Idaho Street) at NV-225 North. Use NV-225 north to Boise. Continue west on BL-80 to Elko West. Turn left for Silver St.

item.title: BL-80 West at NV-225 (To I-80)
item.description: BL-80 West at NV-225 North. Continue west on BL-80 to access I-80.

item.title: BL-80 West To NV-225/I-80
item.description: NV-225 North, To I-80
